title: I would much rather prefer longer games..
body: If it meant less snowballing in games. Seriously though, the early game has WAY too much influence over late game. At this point First Tower might as well mean First Nexus. Winning in ranked right now if you don't play ADC is essentially just praying to Rito that you're ADC will be slightly less hollow-headed than the enemy ADC.

however ADC's are generally at there strongest in the late game.
nice try though

Turret first blood is a giant pile of gold, and botlane intentionally does not have turret damage reduction in the early game, making it very easy to get turrets there. It has nothing to do with ADCs as a class or when they are strong.

so you basically just proved your a giant tool

so if the argument is about bot lane turret then why single out the ADC?
correct me if im wrong but the bot lane consist of a support and a ADC.
you would also have to factor in mid lane roams, jungle ganks, and top lane TP's
these all affect how quickly a bot lane turret can go down.
so why is his/ur comment about early game snow-balling and the team with the better ADC being the only deciding factor?

btw, if you wanna comment about how often someone plays the game u might wanna check their match history first.
